message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the product's value is worth $10,000 to you.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your perspective, the product's value to me is closer to the higher end. How about we settle at $11,200?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $11,000. How about we meet in the middle at $10,900?
